mapper.update: update users set user_nickname = #{user_nickname}, user_name = #{user_name}, user_email = #{user_email}, user_phone = #{user_phone}, user_pw = #{user_pw} where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rn, a.* from (select * from comments where user_no = #{userNo} order by comment_date DESC) a) b where b.rn between #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
